item.description:
It's summer and time to let our hair down a little.  As many of you know from attending meetings in the past couple of months, my deck is been in a state of re-construction.  Now that it's done, let's gather for an informal evening of wine & appetizers.

 

We've completed our tour of Old World European Wine Regions and encountered many excellent white wines along the way.  We'll make this a potluck event, so please bring:

1) a bottle of white wine from your favorite European wine region

2) an appetizer to share with the group

 

We'll take a trip down memory lane as we sample the wines.

 

Thanks,

Noel

group.name: The MetroWest White Wine Meetup Group

item.name: Summer White Wine Social
